column4: i have a question, when i boot into recovery mode and go to root shell i am able to edit files on my system without having to use a password, why is this,
are you editing your own non-root files?
i just know i can edit and save files, read system directories, seems kinda scary that someone can just walk up and get into root, i can't see my home files though
think of this if someone would steal your computer they could get to stuff without recovery.
